skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

As the Rampagers hurtle towards their hapless foes, a palpable wave of dread washes over those unlucky enough to stand in their path. The enemy ranks, once standing firm with weapons at the ready, falter and waver in the face of the oncoming tempest. The merciless advance of Vaslo Kruld, adorned in his obsidian armor and crowned with the demonic skull helmet, sends shivers down the spines of even the most seasoned warriors.

A surge of unholy vitality courses through Vaslo Kruld and his devoted Juggernaut as they charge headlong into battle. The healing power is most potent at the moment of impact, as the collision with the enemy forces unleashes a burst of unholy energy.

Under Vaslo's command, the Rampagers are a relentless horde of berserkers, their loyalty to Khorne unwavering. Each member of the warband is a savage warrior adorned in macabre trophies, symbols of their dedication to the Lord of Skulls. The Rampagers descend upon their enemies like a storm of violence, fueled by the insatiable desire to spill blood in the name of Khorne.

effects.description:
Weapon Strength: +5% for Skullcrushers of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Bonus vs Large: +3 for Skullcrushers of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Weapon Strength: +10% for Skullcrushers of Khorne units

	(all units in army)

Weapon Strength: +15% for Skullcrushers of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Bonus vs Large: +9 for Skullcrushers of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: As the pounding hooves of his Juggernaut reverberates through the war-torn earth, Vaslo raises the Skullreaper high, its wicked blades catching the glint of blood-streaked sunlight. The air crackles with the impending violence as the Rampagers charge headlong into the massed ranks of Empire swordsmen, their disciplined formation thrown into disarray by the sheer force of the avalanche's impact.

As the battlefield echoes with the screams of the fallen and the clash of steel, Vaslo charges forward fter his fleeing prey, leaving a trail of fallen adversaries in his wake. The skulls adorning his armor rattle ominously, a haunting reminder of the countless foes he has vanquished in Khorne's name. A malevolent aura envelops him, and with each victorious swing of the Skullreaper, the scent of spilled blood only intensifies.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

skillTree.localised_description: As Vaslo's dark armor absorbs the impact of enemy strikes, an ominous crimson aura begins to envelop him, marking the unholy transformation. The once-disciplined and calculated leader now becomes an embodiment of raw, unbridled rage. The demonic skull helmet seems to emanate an eerie glow, and Vaslo's eyes burn with an intensity that mirrors the fires of Khorne's realm. The more damage he endures, the more potent Vaslo becomes, an insatiable hunger for carnage fueling the Rampager's every movement.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases as the unit takes damage

skillTree.localised_description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.
No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!
"KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"
"Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"
With every other thought squeezed from his mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.
"None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"
"Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."
All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
The raging fire of hate manifests itself in battle, immolating enemies in its smouldering heat.
No magic can deter one driven by the murderous force of fury.
"Sacrifice in the Blood God's name, and soak in the blessings of his favour!"
Standing face to face with your enemy means getting to watch the light fade from their eyes when you win.
Every dark army requires a particularly twisted mind, capable of thinking three steps ahead of the enemy.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%

skillTree.localised_description: A leader is needed on the field of battle, able to rally the forces of Chaos in even the most dire situations.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

A unit with the Mark of Khorne has:
	➕ Frenzy Passive Ability
	➕ Increased  Spell Resistance
	➕ Increased  Armour
	➖ Reduced  Melee Defence

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

items.colour_text: Forged in the fiery depths of Khorne's domain, this infernal weapon is a grotesque fusion of dark sorcery and daemonic craftsmanship, its shaft crafted from the blackened bones of fallen champions and bound together with sinewy strands of daemonic flesh. Though formidable in melee combat, the true power of the Lance of Skulls lies in its ability to launch skullcannon projectiles at distant foes. These infernal missiles are forged from the souls of the slain and imbued with the wrath of Khorne himself. When launched from the Lance of Skulls, they streak across the battlefield with lethal precision, leaving a trail of fiery destruction in their wake. Each skullcannon projectile is adorned with blasphemous runes and sigils, marking them as instruments of Khorne's divine wrath. Upon impact, they detonate with cataclysmic force, unleashing a blast of infernal energy that engulfs everything in its path.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Vaslo Kruld was once a Lancer in the Kislevite Gryphon Legions, but fell from honour and grace when bloodlust eclipsed his soul. He soon rode as one of Khorne's fabled skullcrushers, free to sate his gory appetites in the company of men as lost and savage as he. His former comrades are now his greatest choice of prey.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: -20 with all Kislev factions

Charge bonus: +25% when fighting against Kislev
	(all units in army)

Double experience gain for units when fighting against Kislev
	(all units in army)
